title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Mosaic Tile Area Rug at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: From Kenneth Cole Reaction Home, this sculpted multicolored area rug in acrylic/polypropylene has a textured, geometric look reminiscent of fine tile work. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/product.asp?SKU=208057
From Kenneth Cole Reaction Home, this sculpted multicolored area rug in acrylic/polypropylene has a textured, geometric look reminiscent of fine tile work. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: Exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond the mosaic tile area rug designed in the studios of Kenneth Cole was inspired by the urban landscape, specifically the cobblestone streets. A dimensional sculpted area rug it plays with a radiating interpretation of old street pavements and tunnel stone and grays. This area rug is available in four sizes and is an easy care acrylic polypropylene blend. The mosaic tile area rug is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection. It is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
